dc:title: Remembering St. Francis
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Compares St. Francis and his community with the C.W. Encourages the imitation of Francis and also his vow of pacifism.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 124 1965-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
